trans-unit.source: Your memory usage is not limited.
Your memory limit is %memory_limit%, which is good.
Your memory limit is %memory_limit%, which is okay.
Your memory limit is increased to %memory_limit%.
Your memory limit is %memory_limit%, which is to low.
An unlimited memory limit is perfect to run composer in every environment.
A memory limit of 1024 MiB or higher is pretty good run composer, even in growing environments.
A memory limit of 512 MiB is the minimum to run composer, but it may be too less in growing environments.
We have increased the memory limit to 1024 MiB, if required it is possible to increase it to a higher value.
A memory limit of 512 MiB is the minimum to run composer, it may run with %memory_limit% but it is not supposed to work.
